basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Ray Tassin Endowed Scholarship in Mass Communication
basic_information.committee_name: CLA - Mass Comm Dr. Ray Tassin Scholarship

description: This scholarship is awarded to honor the memory of Dr. Ray Tassin, former UCO journalism department chair and founder of the Oklahoma Journalism Hall of Fame. It recognizes a Mass Communication student who shows passion and commitment to their chosen major as evidenced by strong academic performance. Eligibility Requirements Minimum 3.0 GPA Full-time student Mass Communication major Must be continuing student for the fall semester that the scholarship is awarded

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
